sentences.1: calm within 30 seconds when picked up
sentences.2: look continuously at an object for 7 to 10 seconds
sentences.3: habituate to a rattle within the first 3 trials
sentences.6: display a clearly anticipatory reaction to caregiver
sentences.7: display a reaction to the departure of caregiver
sentences.9: show visual preference for a striped pattern
sentences.11: show preference for ball over balloons
sentences.12: respond to surroundings with visual exploration
sentences.13: explore objects by touching, shaking, or manipulating them
sentences.17: persistently reach for and obtain objects
sentences.18: play with paper by scratching, crinkling, or mouthing it

sentences.1: consistently look at a person and sustain look for at least 3 seconds
sentences.6: display a reaction that is clearly anticipatory
